attributes.action: Allow weddings and receptions for up to 50 people
attributes.additional_details: Allow indoor and outdoor weddings of up to 50 people with a reception providing contact details are all taken in order to track and trace.
attributes.background: We are now allowed a wedding of 30 people but not a reception? Yet we can go to the pub with 150 unknown people but can’t have a wedding reception with our family? This needs to change sooner rather than later to save the sector and couples dreams! Make this happen for August 15th.
